infoModal.title: About Pokemon TCG Pocket Deck Tier List

whatIsThis.title: What is this website?
whatIsThis.description: This website shows the current best decks for the Pokemon TCG Pocket game based on tournament performance data from {{limitlessLink}}. The tier list is updated regularly to reflect the latest meta.

deckLists.title: View Deck Lists
deckLists.description: Click on any deck in the tier list to view its complete card list.

missingCards.title: Missing Cards Feature
missingCards.description: When viewing a deck list, you can click on cards you don't have. The website will then show you the next best deck that you can make without those cards.

dynamicTierList.title: Dynamic Tier List
dynamicTierList.description: As you mark cards as missing, the tier list will update to reflect the new ratings based on the cards you have available.

dataSources.title: Data Sources
dataSources.intro: This project uses two main data sources:

sources.tournament: Tournament data from {{limitlessLink}}, a leading platform for Pokemon TCG tournaments.
sources.cards: Card data from {{cardsRepoLink}}, an open-source repository that provides comprehensive card information.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: This website is open source. You can find the source code on {{githubLink}}. Contributions are welcome!
